document.full_text: the securities regulator is in talks with major wall street banks to settle fraud allegations relating to the sale of toxic mortgage bonds to various investors that helped unleash the financial crisis, the wall street journal reported, citing sources familiar with the matter.
document.title: banks, sec in talks to settle mortgage charges: report
lines_and_colors: the securities regulator is in talks with major wall street banks to settle fraud allegations relating to the sale of toxic mortgage bonds to various investors that helped unleash the financial crisis, the wall street journal reported, citing sources familiar with the matter.
